          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_9590c815c9acad22c413ba9bd11c06eed8d96bc3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The swallowing effect of refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der schluckende Effekt der Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet d'ingestion de la réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito engolindo do refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto swallowing di rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση κατάποσης της διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto que traga de la refracción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a deep pool appears shallow to an observer outside the water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">swallowing effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein tiefes Pool zu 
einem Beobachter außerhalb des Wassers flach aussieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un regroupement 
profond semble peu profond à un observateur en dehors de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um pool profundo 
parece raso a um observador fora da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che uno stagno 
profondo sembra poco profondo ad un osservatore fuori dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μια βαθιά λίμνη 
εμφανίζεται ρηχή σε έναν παρατηρητή έξω από το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una piscina 
profunda aparece baja a un observador fuera del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlucken des Effektes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ingestion de l'effet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">engolindo o efeito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">swallowing effetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
